summary: This is an email from Michael Hantman, a partner at Holland & Knight LLP, transmitting an initial response to a grand jury subpoena. The email includes standard law firm confidentiality notices and an attachment named '19353_-_certification.pdf'.

persons.name: Michael Hantman
persons.context: He is the sender of the email transmitting an initial response to a grand jury subpoena on behalf of his law firm.

events.title: Transmission of Grand Jury Subpoena Response
events.description: Michael Hantman sends an email transmitting an initial response to a grand jury subpoena, with an attached certification document.

keyFacts: A response to a grand jury subpoena was transmitted via email on March 12, 2020.
The communication originates from Michael Hantman, a partner at the law firm Holland & Knight LLP.
The attached file is named '19353_-_certification.pdf', suggesting it is a certification document related to the subpoena response.
The email contains standard legal confidentiality and privilege notices.
The document is part of the Epstein case files, indicating the grand jury subpoena is related to that investigation.
